If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer The quintessential Parisian fashion house of Balmain has been celebrated by designers and royalty alike since it began in 1945. From these lauded couture roots comes the Pierre Balmain label, a namesake of the brand's founder, and a decidedly downtown collection that draws inspiration from its sophisticated heritage. With a superbly tailored, forward mix of knitwear, denim, and leather, this diffusion line follows true Balmain form, adding a cool rock-n-roll edge and seductive appeal to every piece.
